wikipedia_page.main: Hope Crisp (6 February 1884 – 25 March 1950), was an English tennis player. With Agnes Tuckey he was the first winner of the Wimbledon mixed doubles in 1913.

link_mentions.page: List of Wimbledon mixed doubles champions
response: | 1913 ||  Hope Crisp   Agnes Tuckey ||  James Cecil Parke   Ethel Larcombe || 3–6, 5–3 retired
